review: It has no side effect, I take it in combination of Bystolic 5 Mg and Fish Oil

My son is halfway through his fourth week of Intuniv. We became concerned when he began telling us that he was hearing things, which is strange. He says it only happens in the quiet of his room. He is 7 years old. I am considering stopping the medication.

I used to take another oral contraceptive, which had 21 pill cycle, and was very happy- very light periods, max 5 days, no other side effects. But it contained hormone gestodene, which is not available in US, so I switched to Lybrel, because the ingredients are similar.

This is my first time using any form of birth control. I'm glad I went with the patch. It has been great for me. At first I had slight nausea and breast tenderness. The nausea went away within a week and the breast tenderness is occasional. The patch stays on no matter what. I've been swimming, showering, sweating, and it has not budged. I'm on my third week and I love it!

Suboxone has completely turned my life around.  I feel healthier, I'm excelling at my job and I always have money in my pocket and my savings account.  I had none of those things when I was using.  I am so grateful for Suboxone.
2nd day on 5mg started to work with rock hard erections however experienced headache, lower back pain and muscle aches. Had to stop taking.
He pulled out, but he cummed on my stomach. I took the Plan B 26 hours later, and took a pregnancy test two weeks later - negative.

Abilify changed my life. There is hope. I was on Zoloft and Clonidine when I first started Abilify, but I noticed a immediate improvement in my symptoms. I am on 10mg. I am no longer depressed and have no anxiety. My doctor will be taking me off of the Zoloft soon. I have had no side effects other than some weight gain, but that is a small price to pay for my sanity. I have been on Abilify for almost four months now. I am so grateful for this medication.

I have been taking this medication for nine years. The first eight years I had no problems. This past year I have had severe side effects from this medication. I have experienced severe diarrhea, weight loss, and severe muscle pain. I had a colonoscopy and the lining of my colon was inflamed. I stopped taking the medication and the diarrhea has stopped. I still have the muscle pain. I was taking 320mg. I would not recommend this medication.

This drug has been a life-saver for me. I have been on it for 6 years. I was on a max dose of another drug and my blood pressure was still not under control. My doctor added this and it has been wonderful! My blood pressure is now in the normal range and I have had no side effects. I would highly recommend this drug.
